trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Tipton
There were no other sightings in Tipton on or around August 23rd 2005
Summary: lights over light cloud cover forming a dancing pattern. Springing out, and coming back in at the center
divs: sighting detailsabout 1:30am i went out to check the sky. i had a sighting july 24th, and have been checking every night since. well, last night there were five dancing lights to the north of my house. actually pretty close to my house, and not straight up, but a little farther down. anyway, they were making a pattern. like they would come to the middle, and bounce off the center one, go back out, and turn 1\4 of the circle, and go back in to the middle one again. when they all met in the middle it would get a little brighter too. then they would bounce off and go back out again. it was awsome to watch. i wasn't afraid, just curious. i saw that someone reported the same thing at the same time, that must live north of me. they saw the event to the south, and i saw it to the north. i wish i could talk to this person. we have to live within a few miles of each other.
